root.name: Corpse Party 2: Dead Patient
root.description: OverviewCorpse Party 2: Dead Patient is the first numbered sequel in the Corpse Party horror adventure series and will feature a new setting, cast, and graphical style. The development team that created the first Corpse Party, Team GrisGris, will be developing the sequel under their studio's new title, Grindhouse. A trial version of Corpse Party 2: Dead Patient was released at ComicMaket 83 and the full game will be released episodically starting on May 29, 2013.
